bibl.title: A New Mosaic of Menander's Samia (and an Old Relief).
bibl.note: About: Richard Green, A Scene from Comedy in Brindisi, Prometheus 40 (2014) pp. 100-110, 6 figg. - Demeas is not entreating Chrysis, but expelling her, as in a Mytilene mosaic, in a Louvre relief and a wall-painting from Pompei. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Angelo Casanova, A New Mosaic of Menander's Samia (and an Old Relief).

About: Richard Green, A Scene from Comedy in Brindisi, Prometheus 40 (2014) pp. 100-110, 6 figg. - Demeas is not entreating Chrysis, but expelling her, as in a Mytilene mosaic, in a Louvre relief and a wall-painting from Pompei. - Avec résumé en anglais.
